'''Alchemist's Crafting Bench''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Alchemist's Crafting Bench is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

Interacting with the Alchemist's Crafting Bench opens the [[Crafting]] menu and allows the player to use it as an alchemy [[Crafting Bench]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.

|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|White Iron Chunk = 20
|sort = White Iron Chunk
